verses.text: Why \w boastest|strong="H1984"\w* thou thyself in \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w*, O \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* man? the \w goodness|strong="H2617"\w* of \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \add endureth\add* \w continually|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 52.1 \ft Maschil: or, of instruction\f*

Thy \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w deviseth|strong="H2803"\w* \w mischiefs|strong="H1942"\w*; like a \w sharp|strong="H3913"\w* \w razor|strong="H8593"\w*, \w working|strong="H6213"\w* \w deceitfully|strong="H7423"\w*.

Thou \w lovest|strong="H0157"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* more than \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; \add and\add* \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* rather than to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

Thou \w lovest|strong="H0157"\w* all \w devouring|strong="H1105"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, O \add thou\add* \w deceitful|strong="H4820"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*.\f + \fr 52.4 \ft O thou…: or, and the deceitful tongue\f*

\w God|strong="H0410"\w* shall likewise \w destroy|strong="H5422"\w* thee for \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*, he shall take thee \w away|strong="H2846"\w*, and pluck thee \w out|strong="H5255"\w* of \add thy\add* dwelling \w place|strong="H0168"\w*, and root thee \w out|strong="H8327"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.\f + \fr 52.5 \ft destroy…: Heb. beat thee down\f*
The \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* also shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, and \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*, and shall \w laugh|strong="H7832"\w* at him:

Lo, \add this is\add* the \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \add that\add* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* not \w God|strong="H0430"\w* his \w strength|strong="H4581"\w*; but \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* in the \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w* of his \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*, \add and\add* \w strengthened|strong="H5810"\w* himself in his \w wickedness|strong="H1942"\w*.\f + \fr 52.7 \ft wickedness: or, substance\f*

But I \add am\add* like a \w green|strong="H7488"\w* olive \w tree|strong="H2132"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: I \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in the \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

I will \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, because thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add it:\add* and I will \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* on thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*; for \add it is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* before thy \w saints|strong="H2623"\w*.
